Sentencas: Lanthanum strontium manganate (LSM) perovskite oxide has been widely employed as cathode materials for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Effect of spray parameters on the electrical conductivity of plasma-sprayed La1-xSrxMnO3 coating for the cathode of SOFCs

Sentencas: Plasma spraying is a promising cost-effective process to deposit La1-xSrxMnO3 cathode.
Titulo: Effect of spray parameters on the electrical conductivity of plasma-sprayed La1-xSrxMnO3 coating for the cathode of SOFCs

Sentencas: In this study, the La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 layer was deposited at different plasma powers and spray distances to examine the effect of spray parameters on the electrical conductivity of the LSM deposits.
Titulo: Effect of spray parameters on the electrical conductivity of plasma-sprayed La1-xSrxMnO3 coating for the cathode of SOFCs

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity of the deposits along the lamellar direction was measured by a four-probe dc technique.
Titulo: Effect of spray parameters on the electrical conductivity of plasma-sprayed La1-xSrxMnO3 coating for the cathode of SOFCs

Sentencas: The microstructure of the deposit was characterized by electron microscopy and X-ray diffraction analysis.
Titulo: Effect of spray parameters on the electrical conductivity of plasma-sprayed La1-xSrxMnO3 coating for the cathode of SOFCs

Sentencas: The results showed that the electrical conductivity of plasma-sprayed LSM coating was lower than that of bulk sintered material of the same compositions.
Titulo: Effect of spray parameters on the electrical conductivity of plasma-sprayed La1-xSrxMnO3 coating for the cathode of SOFCs

Sentencas: It was recognized that the change of the electrical conductivity of plasma-sprayed LSM coatings with spray parameters coincided with the tendency of the lamellar interface bonding ratio.
Titulo: Effect of spray parameters on the electrical conductivity of plasma-sprayed La1-xSrxMnO3 coating for the cathode of SOFCs

Sentencas: The lamellar structure features with the limited interface bonding limited the electrical conductivity.
Titulo: Effect of spray parameters on the electrical conductivity of plasma-sprayed La1-xSrxMnO3 coating for the cathode of SOFCs

Sentencas: Moreover, it was also found that the minor metastable phase in the as-sprayed coating reduced the electrical conductivity.
Titulo: Effect of spray parameters on the electrical conductivity of plasma-sprayed La1-xSrxMnO3 coating for the cathode of SOFCs

Sentencas: The annealing treatment at a high temperature led to the elimination of the metastable phase and improved the electrical conductivity.
Titulo: Effect of spray parameters on the electrical conductivity of plasma-sprayed La1-xSrxMnO3 coating for the cathode of SOFCs

Sentencas: The dependency of electrical conductivity of the deposit on the microstructure is discussed.
Titulo: Effect of spray parameters on the electrical conductivity of plasma-sprayed La1-xSrxMnO3 coating for the cathode of SOFCs
Effect of spray parameters on the electrical conductivity of plasma-sprayed La1-xSrxMnO3 coating for the cathode of SOFCs
